lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help my family in the Philippines to establish a small business that can help sustain my family's daily needs and to improve their lifestyle,partly,be able to have a nice and comfortable home to live on. Also, to make my youngest brother's wish come true,to put-up a "sari-sari store" or grocery store that can be a good source of income to help-out my parents. And, I want to channel the opportunity to my"kababayans" or fellow Mindanao people where I can possibly be a good help to travel to Mindanao and speak the native dialect of the lumads or Visayan dialect to promote this particular project or opportunity that can enhance and develop a good community service and enterprenuership in Mindanao,Philippines. I am currently in the US but not working,except my husband. Due to my family's needs in the Philippines that I have difficulty providing them with their needs as or resources here is also limited, viewing on TFC regarding KIVA program makes me excited to give a try and perhaps, I can be part for any developmental program for Mindanao.
lender.occupational_info: I am a home-maker. I take care of my family and provide them more than what I could afford as means I love them more than myself. And, I am the financial in-charge of the home that make sure I pay bills on-time or look into a responsibility that involves financial issues to be at steak and in good shape for the benefit of the family and to what I can give unto others for my goods.

lender.occupational_info: Caribbean BlueBook is a unique and influential online marketplace where Caribbean Islanders can come together and support each other. lender.occupational_info:
I am entering my last at a university and then I'll hopefully go into the field of advertising.
I am a full-time student so I am in class most of the time. I also have a couple of part-time jobs on the side.
Advertising in the United States is a fairly large industry. Companies want to compete with each other and use different techniques to grab consumers' attention and hopefully sell their products.

lender.occupational_info: I work with like-minded people to help create a better world through a faith-based community. We can't do it all by ourselves but by doing whatever it is that is in front of us - diligently and with humility - we add that much more toward helping to create a better world.

lender.name: Thomas Oommen
lender.loan_because: I believe my small loans will make a difference in someone's life. I also believe "It is better to lend a hand than give a handout"
lender.occupational_info: Founder of www.TravelSupplyStore.com a webstore selling Travel Goods.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I believe that the only solution to poverty in our world is if we all get involved in the solution. Waiting for someone else to solve the problems is futile. Doing nothing because you cannot do everything is not an option.
lender.occupational_info: I have two jobs. In one, I work as a healer, using healing energy called Reiki. In my other work I teach people how to use computers.

lender.name: watersmooth_silver
lender.loan_because: Just passing it on.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I'm a computer software entrepreneur

lender.name: Bastiaan
lender.loan_because: I believe that microcredit offers the best opportunity to help me create a better world...
lender.occupational_info: I am working as a scientist at Wageningen University & Research Centre, the Netherlands

lender.name: Erik
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer science student, at Delft University of Technology. I am also the founder of a small ICT-company.

lender.name: Rich & Geri
lender.loan_because: We care.
lender.occupational_info: Rich - Sales Engineer Geri - Customer Service Agent.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: it's such a simple thing and requires so little to make an impact. Yeah, I'm lazy...but in a GOOD way!

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I have an interest in Latin American institutional power (micro lending and cooperatives structures).
lender.occupational_info: I'm a grad student studying geography. Specifically, I'm looking at landscape change, extractive industries, water privatization and effects of neoliberal processes on Bolivian highland dwellers.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to be able to financially support themselves and their families. So little can do so much.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people by giving them a chance to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Computer technology development

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: I like enabling people

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: My small donation, combined with the donation of other lenders, is a powerful tool in fighting poverty and providing opportunities for success around the world.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: This is my way of passing some of my good fortune on to others that may gain and grow in order to pass on to others.
lender.occupational_info: I look for those who have the right idea, principles and character to be successful.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: It gives meaning to my life to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I do office work for a living. In my job I have the opportunity to meet people from many countries. I also do Reiki, Bowen Therapy, and Lymphedema therapy part-time.

lender.name: Mark John
lender.loan_because: I care, i care for people to help themselves. I like to help people build a life for themselves through sustainable livelihood.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer, i like working with startups, and i also like mountain biking.

lender.name: Riley's Fund
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Formerly a Corporate Banker, I now acquire and develop medical properties for a Healthcare REIT.

lender.name: Greta
lender.loan_because: It's not a lot of money for me, but it could change someone else's life.

lender.name: Rodney Howard Browne
lender.occupational_info: Rodney Howard Browne - Great Awakening Tour in Cocoa Florida is a blog site dedicated to bringing you bible teachings plus the latest information including news and events on revival as they happen across America and around the world.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: It is a non-profit organization - Dreams for Kids

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I have been needy and others have helped me along the way. Now I am able to return the favor. I am blessed and wish to be a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I occasionally write, blog, and podcast, about education in the US. I bake bread for family and friends.
